name: Aan's Plonk File Script
description: "Fades out" known trolls from File770.com comments.
additional_info: For the convenience of the commenters at File 770. The original version of this style and the screenshot come from Tegan's excellent set up instructions. To completely white out the trolls, change "opacity: .7;" to "opacity: 1;" or use Aan's White-out File Script
